messages.messageBody:
I'm on digest so I don't know if the lingo had been answered yet. Here's some links for those that need it. :-)Tracy http://www.netlingo.com/emailsh.cfm <small example>BTWBy the wayCMIIWCorrect me if I'm wrongCULSee you laterDHDarling husband (or 'Darn husband' depending on context)DWDarling wife (see DH)
